summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 88th Street and East 89th Street, each from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution 15641 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
